code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ProfileDetail=_ref=>{let{match,token}=_ref;const{id}=match.params;const[profile,setProfile]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{const fetchProfile=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/profiles/".concat(id),{headers:{Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setProfile(response.data);}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching profile:',error);}};fetchProfile();},[id,token]);if(!profile){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:profile.username}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Bio:"})," ",profile.bio]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Skills:"})," ",profile.skills]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Projects:"})," ",profile.projects]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{children:"Achievements:"})," ",profile.achievements]}),profile.picture&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"/uploads/".concat(profile.picture),alt:"Profile"})]});};export default ProfileDetail;
